text: (Musalmaano)! Kaho ke: “hum iman laye Allah par aur us hidayat par jo hamari taraf nazil hui hai aur jo Ibrahim, Ismail, Ishaq, Yakub aur aulad e Yakub ki taraf nazil hui thi aur jo Moosa aur Isa aur dusre tamaam paighambaron ko unke Rubb ki taraf se di gayi thi. Hum unke darmiyan koi tafreeq nahin karte aur hum Allah ke Muslim hain”
